definition: to be the mirror image of sth/enantiomorphic/antipodal/enantiomeric (chemistry)
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
to reflect (light)/to shine/to project (an image onto a screen etc)

sentences.english: The present invention concerns enantioselective preparation of sulphoxide derivatives or their salts.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及亞碸衍生物或其鹽的對映選擇性製備。

sentences.english: The partially separation of benzoin and dansyl-amino acids were also achieved.
sentences.chinese: 對安息香和氨基酸衍生物對映異構體能部分分離。

sentences.english: Such molecules are known as enantiomorphs or optical isomers .
sentences.chinese: 這種分子被稱爲對映結構體或旋光異物體。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the conditions of well in which anomalies were recorded and mechanism of teleseismic effect are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 並對映震井孔的條件，遠震效應的機理進行了探討。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To discuss the research and control of diastereoisomeric impurities in synthetic peptide drugs development.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討多肽合成中非對映異構體雜質的研究和控制。

sentences.english: The binary operations in that ring have as domain ordered pairs of functions, and as codomain functions.
sentences.chinese: 因此定義域和對映域是函數一開始就確定的強制約束。

sentences.english: Furthermore, we discovered the recrystallization solvent for separation of the diastereomer.
sentences.chinese: 發現了分離非對映異構體的重結晶溶劑。

sentences.english: The position of bromo atoms has definite influence on the sulfoxidation of enantioselectivity.
sentences.chinese: 溴原子所在的位置對反應的對映選擇性有一定影響。
